fko.chessly.player.computer

Interface ObservableEngine

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Engine
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FluxEngine, OmegaEngine, PulseEngine_v2

    public interface ObservableEngine
extends Engine
    Author:
    fkopp

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int IDLE
      Status when the engine is not doing anything
      static int PONDERING
      Status when the engine is pondering over an opponents possible move
      static int THINKING
      Status when the engine is calculating the next move
